issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Creating Cloudformation Stack with alphanumeric name less than 255 characters returns an odd error

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Cloudformation stack name should only allow alphanumeric characters

comments.body: Fixed as part of the EUCA-9946 patch.
[~hspencer], please open a separate issue for the failure when long stack names are used.
While verifying the fix for this issue, discovered EUCA-10267.
This issue is fixed and should have been verified not rejected. It was inadvertently rejected because testing found EUCA-10267 which was opened as another issue.
